assemblyInfo.comments:
The assembly mChiNiv1.1 is based on 26x PacBio data and Arima2 Hi-C data generated by the Wellcome Sanger Institute Tree of Life Programme (https://www.sanger.ac.uk/programme/tree-of-life/) as part of the European Reference Genome Atlas pilot project
(https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/pilot-project). The assembly process included the following sequence of steps: initial PacBio assembly generation with Hifiasm, retained haplotig separation with purge_dups, and Hi-C based scaffolding with YaHS. The mitochondrial genome was assembled using MitoHiFi. Finally, the primary assembly was analysed and manually improved using rapid curation. This alternate haplotype assembly combines the haplotigs separated by purge_dups with haplotigs separated from the primary assembly during curation.
